sentences.sentence: Among all the colonized plants, there are 29 annual and biennial herbs, 13 perennial herbs, 4 lianas and 18 woody plants.
sentences.translation: 全部定居植物中，1 ~ 2年生草本植物29种，多年生草本植物13种，木本植物18种，藤本植物4种。

sentences.sentence: Creeper plants belong to Grape family. They are climber plants that are perennial lignification big lianas. There are about 15 species of creeper plants in the world.
sentences.translation: 爬山虎属植物属于系葡萄科系多年生木质大藤本攀缘植物，全世界约有15种。

sentences.sentence: The GCV and ash-free caloric value (AFCV) decreased in the following order: lianas, tree layer 1, tree layer 2, shrub layer and herb layer. The AFCV differed among various components.
sentences.translation: 各层优势种平均干重热值和去灰分热值都表现为：层间藤本>乔木1层>乔木2层>灌木层>草本层。
